Text: Hell yeah. This is one of my top 10 album's of the '90s, on time Sac! Way ahead of their time and their peers, with the whole crew would make a come back. Easily the best group to come out of Rap-A-Lot aside from the Geto Boys. Thanks!!

@ brizownthepi, No prob brotha  they are definately one of my fav's as well off of Rap-A-Lot.  I got atleast another 300 albums to throw up here.  Hopefully I can add some others that you might not have.  90's was definately a dope time for hip hop/rap.  I'll keep em coming fo sho.
